author: Staff Reporter
text:
Students pursuing technical /professional courses and belonging to SC / ST communities can avail of the final opportunity for the Central government’s interest subsidy scheme on educational loans.

According to a press release, following an order from the Central government, interest subsidy on educational loans for those pursuing technical and professional courses is being implemented for eligible borrowers since April 1, 2009 to March 31, 2014.

The government has now announced a final opportunity to avail the interest subsidy for eligible leftover accounts of students belonging to SC and ST categories.

Eligible students

Eligible students along with their parents can approach the bank branch from where they had availed the educational loan with the appropriate documents to benefit under the scheme.

They should approach the bank manager with the following documents - recent family income certificate, recent mark list/course completion certificate, application form for interest subsidy that is available at the bank branch, S. Damodaran, lead bank manager said in a press release.

The last date to submit the required documents in the banks is March 15, 2016.
title: Final opportunity to avail of interest subsidy
